page.title: 01WARRINGTON - An Introduction
page.content: {Warrington New Town }is situated half-way between the conurbations of Manchester and Liverpool and is surrounded by three Motorways. Two major rail routes pass through the centre and the Manchester Ship Canal is also close to the town. All this has meant that Warrington has developed into a thriving industrial and commercial centre. Warrington itself has a tremendous depth of character, with many historic traditions and places successfully merged with up-to-the-minute technology. It is extremely difficult to isolate a small number of topics to represent such a variety of 'faces' but we hope that the areas chosen give some indication of Warrington,1985
